flawed_nl_solution:
10% + 50% = 60% of the chips in the jar are not green.
So, 100% - 60% = 10% of the chips are green.
There are 10%/10% = 1 sets of 10% to make 10%.
Hence, there are 3 chips x 1 sets = <<3*1=3>>3 green chips.
#### 3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
